annotation.spannedText: All children and adults should be immunised against tetanus

classMention.mentionClass: All children and adults should be immunised against tetanus

annotation.spannedText: See your practice nurse if you think that you are not fully immunised

classMention.mentionClass: See your practice nurse if you think that you are not fully immunised

annotation.spannedText: Tetanus is largely a disease of the developing world and the poor, where there is inadequate vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: Tetanus is largely a disease of the developing world and the poor, where there is inadequate vaccination

annotation.spannedText: These antibodies protect you from illness should you become infected with tetanus

classMention.mentionClass: These antibodies protect you from illness should you become infected with tetanus

annotation.spannedText: See your practice nurse if you think that you are not fully immunised against tetanus

classMention.mentionClass: See your practice nurse if you think that you are not fully immunised against tetanus

annotation.spannedText: If you are unwell with an illness causing a high temperature (fever), it is wise to postpone an injection until the illness has gone (except if the dose is needed after a cut or wound)

classMention.mentionClass: If you are unwell with an illness causing a high temperature (fever), it is wise to postpone an injection until the illness has gone (except if the dose is needed after a cut or wound)

annotation.spannedText: you should not have another injection of vaccine if a previous injection caused a severe reaction

classMention.mentionClass: you should not have another injection of vaccine if a previous injection caused a severe reaction

annotation.spannedText: The tetanus vaccine is safe if you are pregnant or breast-feeding

classMention.mentionClass: The tetanus vaccine is safe if you are pregnant or breast-feeding
